result.ga: An nuacht á cur i láthair ag
result.orig: An nuacht á cur i láthair ag
result.html: An nuacht á cur i láthair agThe news, presented by...
result.ponchtml: An nuaċt á cur i láṫair agThe news, presented by...

result.eng: They were using Irish as a secret language.
result.ga: Bhí an Ghaeilge á húsáid acu mar theanga rúnda
result.orig: Bhí an Ghaeilge á húsáid acu mar theanga rúnda
result.html: Bhí an Ghaeilge á húsáid acu mar theanga rúndaThey were using Irish as a secret language.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an Ġaeilge á húsáid acu mar ṫeanga rúndaThey were using Irish as a secret language.

result.eng: This house was being used as a courthouse.
result.ga: Bhí an teach seo á úsáid mar theach cúirte
result.orig: Bhí an teach seo á úsáid mar theach cúirte
result.html: Bhí an teach seo á úsáid mar theach cúirteThis house was being used as a courthouse.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an teaċ seo á úsáid mar ṫeaċ cúirteThis house was being used as a courthouse.

result.eng: Big money is being paid to cultural schemes each year.
result.ga: Tá airgead mór á íoc le scéimeanna cultúrtha gach bliain
result.orig: Tá airgead mór á íoc le scéimeanna cultúrtha gach bliain
result.html: Tá airgead mór á íoc le scéimeanna cultúrtha gach bliainBig money is being paid to cultural schemes each year.
result.ponchtml: Tá airgead mór á íoc le scéimeanna cultúrṫa gaċ bliainBig money is being paid to cultural schemes each year.

result.html: Tá an brabús á charnadhThe profit is accumulating.
result.ponchtml: Tá an brabús á ċarnaḋThe profit is accumulating.

result.eng: They are planning a new system.
result.ga: Tá córas nua á bheartú acu
result.orig: Tá córas nua á bheartú acu
result.html: Tá córas nua á bheartú acuThey are planning a new system.
result.ponchtml: Tá córas nua á ḃeartú acuThey are planning a new system.

result.eng: A house is available for rent in city centre.
result.ga: Tá teach á ligint ar cíos i lár na cathrach
result.orig: Tá teach á ligint ar cíos i lár na cathrach
result.html: Tá teach á ligint ar cíos i lár na cathrachA house is available for rent in city centre.
result.ponchtml: Tá teaċ á ligint ar cíos i lár na caṫraċA house is available for rent in city centre.

result.html: Ná bí á shlogadhDon't gulp it down!
result.ponchtml: Ná bí á ẛlogaḋDon't gulp it down!

result.eng: One night he felt he was choking and fell in a heap on the floor.
result.ga: Oíche amháin mhothaigh sé go raibh sé á thachtadh agus thit sé ina chnap ar an urlár
result.orig: Oíche amháin mhothaigh sé go raibh sé á thachtadh agus thit sé ina chnap ar an urlár
result.html: Oíche amháin mhothaigh sé go raibh sé á thachtadh agus thit sé ina chnap ar an urlárOne night he felt he was choking and fell in a heap on the floor.
result.ponchtml: Oíċe aṁáin ṁoṫaiġ sé go raiḃ sé á ṫaċtaḋ agus ṫit sé ina ċnap ar an urlárOne night he felt he was choking and fell in a heap on the floor.

result.eng: The spies were being observed for a long time.
result.ga: Bhí na spiairí á bhfaire le tamall
result.orig: Bhí na spiairí á bhfaire le tamall
result.html: Bhí na spiairí á bhfaire le tamallThe spies were being observed for a long time.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí na spiairí á ḃfaire le tamallThe spies were being observed for a long time.

result.eng: The attacks were apparently being planned by Osama Bin Laden's soldiers for several years.
result.ga: Is cosúil go raibh na hionsaithe seo á mbeartú ag saighdiúirí Osama Bin Laden le cúpla bliain
result.orig: Is cosúil go raibh na hionsaithe seo á mbeartú ag saighdiúirí Osama Bin Laden le cúpla bliain
result.html: Is cosúil go raibh na hionsaithe seo á mbeartú ag saighdiúirí Osama Bin Laden le cúpla bliainThe attacks were apparently being planned by Osama Bin Laden's soldiers for several years.
result.ponchtml: Is cosúil go raiḃ na hionsaiṫe seo á mbeartú ag saiġdiúirí Osama Bin Laden le cúpla bliainThe attacks were apparently being planned by Osama Bin Laden's soldiers for several years.

result.eng: They [ie. blogs] were dealing with a wide range of topics and giving opinions on everything under the sun.
result.ga: Bhíodh raon fairsing ábhair faoi chaibidil iontu agus tuairimí á nochtadh faoi achan rud faoin spéir
result.orig: Bhíodh raon fairsing ábhair faoi chaibidil iontu agus tuairimí á nochtadh faoi achan rud faoin spéir
result.html: Bhíodh raon fairsing ábhair faoi chaibidil iontu agus tuairimí á nochtadh faoi achan rud faoin spéirThey [ie. blogs] were dealing with a wide range of topics and giving opinions on everything under the sun.
result.ponchtml: Ḃíoḋ raon fairsing áḃair faoi ċaibidil iontu agus tuairimí á noċtaḋ faoi aċan rud faoin spéirThey [ie. blogs] were dealing with a wide range of topics and giving opinions on everything under the sun.

result.eng: His wife was only dead for a couple of days when people started saying in secret that he was thinking of helping himself to a new one.
result.ga: Ní raibh a bhean marbh ach cupla mí go rabhathas á rá i modh rúin go raibh sé ag smaoineamh ar cheann eile a tharraingt air
result.orig: Ní raibh a bhean marbh ach cupla mí go rabhathas á rá i modh rúin go raibh sé ag smaoineamh ar cheann eile a tharraingt air
result.html: Ní raibh a bhean marbh ach cupla mí go rabhathas á rá i modh rúin go raibh sé ag smaoineamh ar cheann eile a tharraingt airHis wife was only dead for a couple of days when people started saying in secret that he was thinking of helping himself to a new one.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ a ḃean marḃ aċ cupla mí go raḃaṫas á rá i moḋ rúin go raiḃ sé ag smaoineaṁ ar ċeann eile a ṫarraingt airHis wife was only dead for a couple of days when people started saying in secret that he was thinking of helping himself to a new one.

result.eng: That's what they say about him, be it true or false.
result.ga: Táthar á chur sin air cibé acu fíor bréag an scéal
result.orig: Táthar á chur sin air cibé acu fíor bréag an scéal
result.html: Táthar á chur sin air cibé acu fíor bréag an scéalThat's what they say about him, be it true or false.
result.ponchtml: Táṫar á ċur sin air cibé acu fíor bréag an scéalThat's what they say about him, be it true or false.

result.eng: Maybe things wouldn't be like this [the family being evicted] if had been more economical/thrifty.
result.ga: B'fhéidir nach mbeadh sé mar seo an teaghlach á cur as seilbh da mbíodh sé féin níos tábhachtaí
result.orig: B'fhéidir nach mbeadh sé mar seo an teaghlach á cur as seilbh da mbíodh sé féin níos tábhachtaí
result.html: B'fhéidir nach mbeadh sé mar seo an teaghlach á cur as seilbh da mbíodh sé féin níos tábhachtaíMaybe things wouldn't be like this [the family being evicted] if had been more economical/thrifty.
result.ponchtml: B'ḟéidir naċ mbeaḋ sé mar seo an teaġlaċ á cur as seilḃ da mbíoḋ sé féin níos táḃaċtaíMaybe things wouldn't be like this [the family being evicted] if had been more economical/thrifty.

result.eng: His teeth were chattering from cold.
result.ga: Bhí a chár á ghreadadh ar a chéile le fuacht
result.orig: Bhí a chár á ghreadadh ar a chéile le fuacht
result.html: Bhí a chár á ghreadadh ar a chéile le fuachtHis teeth were chattering from cold.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí a ċár á ġreadaḋ ar a ċéile le fuaċtHis teeth were chattering from cold.
